pageTitle: Talks to avert Tube strikes continue

title.title: Talks to avert Tube strikes continue

texts: London Underground (LU) has welcomed ASLEF's decision to call off strike action planned for next Tuesday (21 February) and is continuing talks with RMT which has also announced strike action on the same day.
We welcome ASLEF's decision to suspend next Tuesday's strike
An LU spokesperson said: 'We welcome ASLEF's decision to suspend next Tuesday's strike while talks continue.
'Talks also continue with RMT and we hope that both unions will resolve any issues through discussion.'
